import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk copy assets"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/bulk/copy"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates duplicate copies of multiple assets in a single operation. Use this for cloning device configurations or creating asset templates.

**Prerequisites**
1. **AssetIds** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) to identify source assets and extract `Items[].AssetId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for source assets: [POST /api/v1.0/assets](/docs/api/assets/search-assets) with filters for the devices to clone.
2. Extract `Items[].AssetId` from the response.
3. Submit [POST /api/v1.0/assets/bulk/copy](/docs/api/assets/bulk-asset-copy) with the collected AssetIds.

**Minimal Required Fields**: AssetIds array

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"SourceId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"Assets":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"AssetTag":{"type":"string"}}}}},"title":"BulkCopyAssetRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Assets copied successfully"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
